group_1.textCenter: To start...maybe I could do some end of the@year cleaning?

group_1.textLeft: Mitamaaa!

group_1.textRight: Hiii!

group_1.textCenter: (I'll have to work in between coordinating @sessions.)

group_1.textRight: Thanks so much, Mitama!

group_1.textLeft: We'll come back lots next year too!

group_1.textCenter: All right then, have a happy new year!
(Okay, so I'll start by doing a big cleanup.)

group_1.textLeft: Excuse me! You here, Mitama?

group_1.textRight: Um, h-hi...

group_1.textLeft: See ya next year for more of the same!

group_1.textRight: Th-thank you...and...um...bye.

group_1.textCenter: As happy as I am for this wave of@customers...
If this keeps up, I might have to settle@for finishing my cleaning next year.

group_1.textRight: Hello.
Pardon our intrusion!
Oh, Mitama... [chara:300401:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300401:cheek_0][chara:300401:face_mtn_ex_041.exp.json][chara:300401:lipSynch_1]Um, you have a little dust@on you...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101700:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]I do?! Oh, for goodness' sake...

group_1.textRight: Did we catch you in the middle of cleaning?

group_1.textLeft: Bingo, yes I am♪ Were you watching me in @secret?

group_1.textRight: Of course not, we came by to see you before@New Year's... I just finished cleaning, too.
I and the other disciples at the dojo did@our own thorough cleaning recently.
It feels amazing to scrub away an entire@year's worth of dirt!

group_1.textLeft: So you're both already finished? What early@birds you are!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* Asuka got herself in big trouble @when she did her cleaning.
[chara:101301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]H-hey! Don't tell her!

group_1.textLeft: Ooh, what? What happened?
When she was cleaning, Asuka lost the key@to the dojo's warehouse.
It took an entire day to find it, isn't that@right?

group_1.textRight: Agh... Grrr...

group_1.textLeft: Uh... Oh, but...
All the plans you made for the big cleaning@day worked perfectly, remember?

group_1.textRight: Hm, they were perfect, yes, but...I just@got distracted and...

group_1.textLeft: Everyone gets distracted from time to time.@It's nothing to be concerned over.
Whatever didn't go as you had hoped this@year can be made up for in the next.

group_1.textRight: Next...next year? [chara:101301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101301:motion_200][chara:101301:cheek_0][chara:101301:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:101301:lipSynch_1]It'll be too late by then!
I must reclaim my cleaning honor as soon @as possible!

group_1.textLeft: I've never heard of that kind of honor @before...
Hmm...
In that case, why don't you assist me in@my own cleaning endeavor?

group_1.textRight: [chara:101301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...! May I?!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, if it will help restore your former@prestige.

group_1.textRight: So long as I am entrusted with this duty...!
I, Asuka Tatsuki, shall do all in my power@to exceed your expectations!
Umm...Mitama?
Are you sure about this? Asking Asuka for@help...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Why, of course♪
What reason would I have to refuse the@assistance of someone so eager to help?

group_1.textRight: Well, Asuka by herself would probably cause@more harm than good...
I'll help too!
[chara:101301:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Wha, must you be so rude?!

group_1.textLeft: Well now! How nice it is to have help!

group_1.textRight: Beach sprints followed by a long swim!@Then, 1,000 practice swings!

group_1.textLeft: Are you certain your body can handle all@that training in a single day?

group_1.textRight: Worry not!
To the contrary, it wouldn't do to be lax@on my first training session of the year.

group_1.textCenter: Excuse me, you two... We're supposed to be@cleaning.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, my apologies.

group_1.textRight: Oh, how thoughtless of me!

group_1.textLeft: Oh...that's right.
What about you, Sasara?
Will you be taking part in Asuka's New@Year's morning training?

group_1.textRight: Mitama, do you want to get this cleaning@done or not?

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle* I'm very sorry. I seem to be in@a talkative mood.

group_1.textRight: Anyway...I won't be participating in Asuka's@New Year's morning training.
My family and I will visit the shrine.
After that, we plan to find a nice place@to eat out together.

group_1.textLeft: Really! What a lovely plan♪
[chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I can't wait to hear about it. And I can't@wait for the souvenirs you'll bring me♪

group_1.textRight: Wow. Did you just casually demand souvenirs@from me?

group_1.textLeft: Heeey, Mitama! You there?
Yoohoo!
